# identifier

**Instance Property**

The string that your app uses to identify the voice control state.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPVoiceControlState/identifier] when calling the [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPVoiceControlTemplate/activateVoiceControlState(withIdentifier:)] method to activate the voice control state.

## Getting State Information

- **titleVariants**: The array of title variants for the voice control state.
- **image**: The image displayed while the voice control template is in this state.
- **repeats**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the display of an animated image repeats the animation sequence indefinitely.
